About Me

Former Mechanical Engineer Found New Passion In Coding

Hi! I’m a software engineer with a focus on web development living in the bay area. After pursuing a MS in Mechanical Engineering and BS in Civil Engineering from Berkeley, I worked for a few years at Tesla and ABS before discovering my passion in building software, tackling complex problems, and designing beautiful interfaces. I’m proficient in various modern web technologies (see my resume)

Outside of coding, I love traveling (I’ve lived in Japan, Germany, and China), cooking (check out Quarantina Recipes), and playing board games. I’m open to various software engineering opportunities with a focus on web development. Feel free to connect with me!

  • React
  • Redux
  • Javascript
  • Django
  • Python
  • PostgreSQL
  • D3.js
  • HTML5
  • SASS
My Portfolio

Check Out Some Of My Projects

Quarantina Recipes

A responsive front-end and back-end application providing users the ability to upload recipes. This app incorporated React-Redux container and Redux selector patterns to architect highly scalable front-end state management that enabled access to listing recipes, user registration and authentication

Tech Stack: React, Redux, ReduxForm, Python, Django, Django REST Framework, PostgreSQL, Semantic UI

Github Live

Streamy

A web application using React and JSON server that allows users to create and view live streams. It also integrated Google Sign-In using OAuth 2.0 flow and handled Auth Status through Redux

Tech Stack: React, Redux, ReduxForm, Node.js, HTML, Semantic UI

Github

Local Gem

A Craiglist web scraper created using Python/Beautiful Soup that allows users to web scrape Craiglist.org posts with a prettier UI.

Tech Stack: Python, Django, HTML, css

Github
